participant_1.background:
I am not married, but my family is very supportive of my music and writing.
I don't have a favorite holiday, but I'm looking forward to seeing my family again.
i am not going to go the extra mile anymore.
My time is more precious than my wedding ring.
i sometimes spend too much money at the casino.

participant_2.background:
I am proud of being able to make my passion for music a reality, even though I have a day job.
I have never been married, but I've been with my partner for over ten years.
I remember playing with my cat in the backyard all day long.
I caught a huge fish on my last fishing trip!
I have my number and my freedom.

content.text: Howdy, how is your day going?
Hey there! It is going great! My partner is in a musical tonight and I am going to go watch them perform.
That sounds so fun! I have never been in a musical, but I love to sing.
Singing is awesome! I have been singing since I was a kid and I am so glad that I made it into my career.
That's amazing! I wish I could make music a reality, but I am just a hobbyist.
That's awesome too! I think it is so important to have a creative outlet.
Thanks! I agree! I love to spend time in the studio when I can.
I love the studio too! It is so peaceful and relaxing.
I'm glad to hear that! It can be pretty stressful for me sometimes, but it is always worth it in the end.
I agree! What do you like to do in the studio?
I love to write and record music. I also really enjoy mixing and mastering tracks.
That sounds really cool! I would love to hear some of your music sometime.
I would love to share it with you! I will send you a link later
